content.c_venueAddress: 268-269 Tottenham Court Rd, Fitzrovia, London W1T 7AQ
content.name: The Devil Wears Prada

primaryPhoto.description:
Gird your loins! THE DEVIL WEARS PRADA has been confirmed for a West End transfer into London’s Dominion Theatre!
Tony Award nominee Vanessa Williams, best known for her celebrated TV roles in Ugly Betty and Desperate Housewives and as a multi-award winning singer, will play the iconic role of Miranda Priestly, the undisputed Queen of Fashion and Editor-in-Chief of Runway Magazine!
A new musical based on the blockbuster film and bestselling novel, THE DEVIL WEARS PRADA features an original score by EGOT winner Elton John, lyrics by Shaina Taub, a book by Kate Wetherhead and direction & choreography by 3-time Tony Award winner Jerry Mitchell (Kinky Boots, Legally Blonde, Pretty Woman, Hairspray).
Hilariously fun and fabulously stylish, THE DEVIL WEARS PRADA tells an inspiring story about discovering what kind of person you truly want to be.
Choose your outfit carefully, and get ready for a new musical that’s hautter than hell – book your THE DEVIL WEARS PRADA theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
